name: Kadhi Pakora
description: A tangy yogurt-based curry with gram flour dumplings, served with rice or roti.
preparation: Mix besan with water and salt, make a thick batter.
Heat oil and deep-fry small dumplings.
Whisk yogurt with besan, turmeric, and water.
Heat oil, add mustard and cumin seeds.
Add yogurt mixture and bring to a boil.
Add fried pakoras and simmer for 10 minutes.

name: Besan Masala Roti
description: A spiced gram flour flatbread, served with butter or curd.
preparation: Mix besan, wheat flour, spices, and salt.
Add water gradually to make a dough.
Roll out into rotis and cook on a tawa with ghee.
Serve hot with butter and curd.

name: Bajre ki Khichdi
description: A traditional Haryanvi dish made with pearl millet and lentils, cooked with ghee and spices.
preparation: Soak bajra for 4-5 hours, then grind coarsely.
Heat ghee in a pressure cooker, add cumin seeds.
Add moong dal, bajra, turmeric, and salt.
Add water and pressure cook for 3-4 whistles.
Serve hot with ghee and buttermilk.

Roll out into rotis and cook on a tawa with ghee.
Serve hot with butter and curd.

name: Bajre ki Khichdi
description: A traditional Haryanvi dish made with pearl millet and lentils, cooked with ghee and spices.
preparation: Soak bajra for 4-5 hours, then grind coarsely.
Heat ghee in a pressure cooker, add cumin seeds.
Add moong dal, bajra, turmeric, and salt.
Add water and pressure cook for 3-4 whistles.
Serve hot with ghee and buttermilk.

name: Kadhi Pakora
description: A tangy yogurt-based curry with gram flour dumplings, served with rice or roti.
preparation: Mix besan with water and salt, make a thick batter.
Heat oil and deep-fry small dumplings.
Whisk yogurt with besan, turmeric, and water.
Heat oil, add mustard and cumin seeds.
Add yogurt mixture and bring to a boil.
Add fried pakoras and simmer for 10 minutes.
